Pre-Game Insights: Germany have won three, drawn two and lost two of their first seven games under Julian Nagelsmann
Germany lost back-to-back friendly losses to Turkey and Austria in December 2023
Germany claimed impressive victories over France and the Netherlands in March 2024
Germany played out a goalless stalemate in their most recent warm-up match with Ukraine on Monday
Greece were eliminated from Euro 2024 qualifying following a heart-breaking penalty-shootout defeat in a playoff semi-final against Georgia
Greece picked up 13 points in their qualification group, with France and the Netherlands the only two nations that they failed to beat
Gus Poyet left his position as Greece boss upon the expiration of his contract just five days after the loss to Georgia
Under-21s coach Nikolaos Papadopoulos has since been placed in interim charge
